'''Alkahest''' is a special refinement material for the event-exclusive weapon [[Cinnabar Spindle]].

==Trivia==
* {{w|Alkahest}} was a theorized "universal solvent" sought-after by alchemists starting around the 15th century and said to be able to separate any material into its pure constituents.
